title: Data Science with Python Course for Beginners | Python Machine Learning | Data Analysis with Python

media:group.media:title: Data Science with Python Course for Beginners | Python Machine Learning | Data Analysis with Python
media:group.media:description:
Data science with Python course will teach you almost every thing you need to know in order to Analyze #data and to build machine learning model. First part of this course will teach you about #Python programming and then it will deep dive into Pandas, matplotlib, #scikit-learn to teach you about data analysis and #machinelearning. This Data science with python course has been designed for absolute #beginners. Hence no pre-requisite is required. 



‚≠êÔ∏è  Download Anaconda: https://www.anaconda.com/products/individual

1:55:08  Intermediate Python programming: Modules, classes, Exceptions
3:33:20  Introduction data analysis with Python
5:30:40  Applied data analysis in Python: Machine learning and #DataScience
